name: push-fcm-plugin
description: Firebase Cloud Messaging plugin for Push.js

scripts._build_script: uglifyjs push.fcm.js -o bin/push.fcm.min.js -m --source-map filename=bin/push.fcm.min.js.map --comments && cp push.fcm.js bin/push.fcm.js
scripts.build: mkdir -p bin && npm run _build_script && npm run _build_sw

author: Tyler Nickerson
